byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Possible candidates to succeed Ban Ki-moon as United Nations secretary general will for first time publicly audition for post; effort is part of UN's push for transparency.

headline.print_headline: U.N. Strives for Transparency in Picking New Secretary General
headline.main: U.N. Strives for Transparency in Picking New Secretary General

snippet: While the United Nations is trying to make the selection of a new secretary general more transparent, the world powers are, as usual, expected to exert undue influence over the process itself.
lead_paragraph: While the United Nations is trying to make the selection of a new secretary general more transparent, the world powers are, as usual, expected to exert undue influence over the process itself.
